judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Beien, Robeets, Pomeeoy, Nix and ManDEEINO, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

Benjamin Levin and John M. Myers, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Solis Adoption Case.
Argued January 14, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Beien, Robeets, Pomeeoy, Nix and ManDEEINO, JJ.

April 20, 1972:
